metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2853 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Heap buffer overflow in Downloads in Google Chrome on Android prior to104.0.5112.101 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the rendererprocess to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
